info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 4:30PM EDT until August 29 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Butler County in west central Pennsylvania... Central Armstrong County in west central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Clarion County in west central Pennsylvania... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 430 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kittanning, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Kittanning, Ford City, New Bethlehem, West Kittanning, Rural Valley, Worthington, Dayton, West Hills, Hawthorn, Manorville, Ford Cliff, and Applewold. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
